long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing OneText, a single note-taking extension for Chrome. Jot down anything that comes to mind, from meeting minutes, personal memos, to-do lists or even as temporary copy-paste media.

Features:

- Lightweight
- Open-source
- Paper-like UI
- Works offline
- Using local storage

*Your note's content is stored locally and is only available in your current browser, so it will be deleted if you clear your browser's data. Don't forget to back it up somewhere safe if needed.

Source Code: https://github.com/irfanfadilah/OneText
